name: 蔡舜宏
objective: 本課程主要是介紹H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Linear Systems
3.　　H-2 and H-inf Spaces
4.　　Internal Stability
5.　　Performance Specifications and Limitations
6.　　Balanced Model Reduction
7.　　Uncertainty and Robustness
8.　　Linear Fractional Transformation
9.　　mu and muSynthesis
10.　　Controller Parmeterizaion
11.　　Algebraic Riccati Equations
12.　　H-2 Optimal Control
13.　　H-inf Control
14.　　Controller Reduction
15.　　H-inf Loop Shaping
16.　　Related Problem Discussions and Oral Presentation
scorePolicy: 1.期中考20% 2.期末考 20% 3.論文研讀書面報告 30% 4.程式報告 30%
materials:
1. Kemin Zhou with John Doyle, Essentials of Robust Control, Prentice Hall, 1998.
2. G. E. Dullerud and F. Paganini, A Course in Robust Control Theory, Springer-Verlag, 2000.
3.上課講義
